text: Allaah wuxuu u ballan qaaday kuwiinna idinka mid ah ee (Xaqa) rumeysan oo samaha fala inuu hubaal uga dhigi doono madax arlada, sidii uu ugu dhigayba madax kuwii ka horreeyay, iyo inuu hubaal u sugi doono diintooda uu isagu oggolaaday. Oo Wuxuu hubaal cabsidoodii kaddib31 siin doonaa nabad beddel ahaan; waase inay i caabudaan (Anigoo Keliya) iyagoon ila wadaajinayn (cibaadada) waxba. Oo mid kastoo abaal laawe ah intani kaddib, kuwan weeye kuwa ah caasiyaashsa
